name: Don't Leave Me Alone (Azula💙)
description:
Where are you? Can you leave? Do you want to leave? That's up to you.

Hi! This was a really fun little project to work on, while I'm making my next (bigger) game. Even if it's short, I hope you enjoy playing! :)

Music Credits: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s49_S42xrt0

Azula💙
